email_subject: FREE SHIPPING! No Minimum Purchase* at Buy.com
email_body: The body of the email is in HTML format and contains promotional content for various products available on Buy.com, including pcAnywhere 10.5, Linksys Wireless PC Card, MouseMan Traveler Optical Mouse, Panasonic DVD-LV50 PalmTheater Portable DVD-Video Player, Acer TM632XCI Notebook, SanDisk SmartMedia Card, US Robotics Modem, and Toshiba PocketPC e310. It also includes information about a free shipping offer and links for more information, product pricing, and availability.
